title: League of Legends Custom Skins Crashed My Game. Help?

embed.description: Skin Installer Ultimate (SIU) is a program made to help you easily install and uninstall skins in the League of Legends video game.

body:
Okay so a few months ago I downloaded SIU (Skin Installer Ultimate) to get custom skins, but I accidentally deleted the SIU.Lite files, and when I re-downloaded SIU it kept crashing. The custom skins also did not show in the menu of skins I installed.
And I tried to load into a game which had a Amumu in it, but apparently he is missing from the game files, as I had Spidermumu instead of original Amumu skin.
So now I have to re-download LoL because I made the stupid decision to delete a file because it didn't look neat in my hard drive (I like things to be organized)

Will this uninstall the custom skins and put the skins and put it back to normal?

replies.body:
Hey man,

You already said you're reinstalling your game, this should definitely fix your problem and yes, it will remove your custom skins.
